_comment: Add a _ before an option name to comment it out and it wont be added to the apworld
Using 'goal' as the name of an option let you override some of the generated goal parameters
description: defeat_meta_knight: Defeat Meta Knight inside Meta Knight Cup to win. Meta Knight Cup is unlocked after clearing Wondaria Remains.
This goal is intended for short multis/playtime.
clear_lab_discovera: Defeat Fecto Elfilis at Lab Discovera to win. This goal is intended for long multis/playtime, but is too short for asyncs.
clear_the_ultimate_cup_z: Defeat Chaos Elfilis inside The Ultimate Cup Z to win. This goal is intended for asyncs, but might be ok in a long
multi if you are a speedrunner or have very little BK time.
100_percent_clear: Complete the game 100%. In other words, get the pop up that tells you that you beat the game 100%. For this Manual, that
means all 300 Waddle Dees and 256 Figures (which is everything else in the game not related to Waddle Dee collection) collected. You are expected
to full clear your seed. This goal is only to be used in long-running asyncs/playtime. You must double check that an async's rules will allow you
to get every check in your seed. If that may be a problem, play with The Ultimate Cup Z Goal instead.
More goals to come in a later version.

filler_traps._comment: Using values here let you set a 'recommended' filler_trap percentage or even a default percentage

description: Should Big-Rig Mouth get randomized like most of the other Mouthful Mode Abilities? If true, one check is removed from Lab Discovera and the item
is instead randomized to a check prior to Lab Discovera. This item is required to beat Lab Discovera regardless of setting. This option is
ignored instead if the goal is to defeat Meta Knight.
Choose whether the Manual should place items in the various Treasure Roads in the game. You may be required to complete some of these challenges
for progression. Beating the target times will NEVER be required. If false, the Manual will remove these locations before placing items. The
Treasure Roads in Winter Horns and beyond are only active if the goal is not to defeat Meta Knight. This option is always enabled if goal is
100% completion.
Choose whether the Manual should place items in the various activities that can be done in Waddle Dee Town. These are:
Talking to the Wise Waddle Dee
Present Codes to Waddle Dee-liveries
Buying items at both Waddle Dee Cafe and the Item Shop
Completing the Help Wanted Mini-Game at all difficulty levels
Tipping The Deedly Dees to upgrade the stage they play on (once after beating Lab Discovera, the other after beating Morpho Knight)
Catching the Bling Blipper at the Fishing Pond next to Kirby's House
Completing the first three levels of Tilt-and-Roll Kirby (you will NOT be required to complete the harder levels)
These locations are ignored if false. Blueprints from Weapons Shop Waddle Dee will always appear regardless of this setting. King Dedede's
Blueprint will also always appear as long as the goal is either The Ultimate Cup Z or 100%. Only Wise Waddle Dee, Waddle Dee-liveries, and
the Cafe are available if the goal is to defeat Meta Knight. This option is always enabled if goal is 100% completion.
